createClassification.name: General
createClassification.description: Category describing generic data types, such as `DateTime`, `Location`, or `BankNumber`

createTags.name: DateTime
createTags.description: Absolute or relative dates or periods or times smaller than a day.

createTags.name: Password
createTags.description: Field holding password information.

createTags.name: BirthDate
createTags.description: Person's birth date.

createTags.name: Gender
createTags.description: Person's gender.

createTags.name: Location
createTags.description: Name of politically or geographically defined location (cities, provinces, countries, international regions, bodies of water, mountains.

createTags.name: Address
createTags.description: Address of a Person.

createTags.name: MedicalLicense
createTags.description: Common medical license numbers.

createTags.name: URL
createTags.description: A URL (Uniform Resource Locator), unique identifier used to locate a resource on the Internet.

createTags.name: IBANCode
createTags.description: The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) is an internationally agreed system of identifying bank accounts across national borders to facilitate the communication and processing of cross border transactions with a reduced risk of transcription errors.

createTags.name: BankNumber
createTags.description: Bank Account Number.

createTags.name: CreditCardNumber
createTags.description: Credit card number of the user.

createTags.name: Crypto
createTags.description: Crypto Wallet Number.

createTags.name: DriverLicense
createTags.description: Person's driver's license image or number.

createTags.name: Email
createTags.description: Email address.

createTags.name: IPAddress
createTags.description: An Internet Protocol (IP) address (either IPv4 or IPv6).

createTags.name: NRP
createTags.description: A personâ€™s Nationality, religious or political group.

createTags.name: Person
createTags.description: A full person name, which can include first names, middle names or initials, and last names.

createTags.name: PhoneNumber
createTags.description: A telephone number.

createTags.name: VATCode
createTags.description: VAT code or identification number. See [VAT Identification Number](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VAT_identification_number).

createTags.name: NationalID
createTags.description: Region specific identifiers, such as [ABN](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australian_Business_Number), [NIF](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/N%C3%BAmero_de_identificaci%C3%B3n_fiscal) or [NHS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Health_Service).

createTags.name: Passport
createTags.description: National passport numbers, such as US or IT passports.
